title: What is the % change in EBITDA Margin from Q3 to Q4 rounded to 2 decimals for KLA Corporation (KLAC on Nasdaq) in FY 2024. Use the company filings 10-Q. Format your answer in % to 2 decimal places.
description:
1. Using KLA Corporation (KLAC on Nasdaq) 10-Q filings for FY2024 Q3 (March 31, 2024) and Q4 ending (June 30, 2024) as well as Q2 (ending 31 December, 2023) (In thousands $) 
 
 2. Extract the following from FY2024 Q3 KLAC 10-Q filings (March 31, 2024) :
 FY 2024 Q3: Net income= 601,541; Provision for income taxes = 100,467 ; Interest expense = 79,981; Total Revenue = 2,359,830
 
 3. To calculate Depreciation & Amortization for FY2024 Q3 - extract Depreciation and amortization (ending Nine months March 31, 2024) = 300,729 (from 10-Q filings ending in March 31, 2024) and subtract Depreciation and amortization (ending Six Months Ended December 31, 2023) = 201,466.
 This yields Depreciation and amortization (ending Three Months Ended March 31, 2024) = 99,263
 
 4. Extract the following from FY2024 Q4 KLAC 10-Q filings (ending June 30, 2024):
 FY 2024 Q4: Net income= 836,446; Provision for income taxes = 108,597 ; Interest expense = 82,836; Depreciation & Amortization = 101,001; Total Revenue = 2,568,735
 
 5. Calculate EBITDA using the formula : EBITDA = Net Income + Income Tax Expense (benefit) + Interest Expense + Depreciation & Amortization.
 
 EBITDA Margin = EBITDA/ Total Revenue x 100 
 
 Percentage change = ((Q4 EBITDA Margin - Q3 EBITDA Margin)/Q3 EBITDA Margin) x 100 
 
 6. FY2024 Q3 EBITDA: EBITDA = 601,541 + 100,467+ 79,981+ 99,263 = 881,252
 FY2024 Q3 EBITDA margin = (881,252/ 2,359,830) x 100 = 37.3439%
 
 FY2024 Q4 EBITDA: EBITDA = 836,446 + 108,597+ 82,836+ 101,001 = 1,128,880
 FY2024 Q4 EBITDA margin = (1,128,880/ 2,568,735) x 100 = 43.94692%
 
 7. Percentage change between Q4 and Q3 = ((43.94692- 37.3439)/37.3439) X 100= 17.68166
 
 8. Format percentage change to 2 decimal places as required:
 17.68%
 
 -

rubric.criteria: Uses KLA 10-Q filings for FY2024 Q3 (March 31, 2024), Q4 (June 30, 2024) and Q2 (ending December 31, 2023) as sources
Net income for FY2024 Q3 = 601,541
FY2024 Q3 Provision for income taxes = 100,467
FY2024 Q3 Interest expense = 79,981
FY2024 Q3 Total Revenue = 2,359,830
Depreciation and amortization (Nine months ended March 31, 2024) = 300,729
Depreciation and amortization (Six months ended December 31, 2023) = 201,466

Depreciation and amortization (Three months ended March 31, 2024) calculated = Depreciation and amortization (Nine months ended March 31, 2024) 300,729 - Depreciation and amortization (Six months ended December 31, 2023) 201,466 = 99,263
FY2024 Q4 Net income = 836,446
FY2024 Q4 Provision for income taxes = 108,597
FY2024 Q4 Interest expense = 82,836
FY2024 Q4 Depreciation & Amortization = 101,001
FY2024 Q4 Total Revenue = 2,568,735
EBITDA formula used: EBITDA = Net Income + Income Tax Expense + Interest Expense + Depreciation & Amortization
EBITDA margin formula used: EBITDA Margin = (EBITDA / Total Revenue) x 100
Percentage change formula used: ((Q4 EBITDA Margin - Q3 EBITDA Margin) / Q3 EBITDA Margin) x 100
FY2024 Q3 EBITDA calculated = 881,252
FY2024 Q3 EBITDA margin calculated = 37.3439%
FY2024 Q4 EBITDA calculated = 1,128,880
FY2024 Q4 EBITDA margin calculated = 43.94692%
Percentage change between Q4 and Q3 calculated =(43.94692- 37.3439)/37.3439) X 100= 17.68166%
percentage change rounded to 2 decimal places and reported = 17.68%
